headline.print_headline: Davis Leads Pelicans Past Nuggets, 111-107 in OT
headline.main: Davis Leads Pelicans Past Nuggets, 111-107 in OT

docs.snippet: Anthony Davis tied his career high with 32 points, grabbed 17 rebounds and blocked six shots, and the New Orleans Pelicans erased a 16-point deficit to capture their third straight victory, 111-107 over the Denver Nuggets in overtime Sunday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony Davis tied his career high with 32 points, grabbed 17 rebounds and blocked six shots, and the New Orleans Pelicans erased a 16-point deficit to capture their third straight victory, 111-107 over the Denver Nuggets in overtime Sunday night.

docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Monday:...
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Monday:

headline.sub: Syrian rebels and government forces battle
headline.main: Syrian rebels and government forces battle

docs.snippet: Amateur footage posted on the internet appears to show fighting between Syrian rebels and government forces in rural areas of Hama and Damascus as well as in Aleppo. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Amateur footage posted on the internet appears to show fighting between Syrian rebels and government forces in rural areas of Hama and Damascus as well as in Aleppo. Jillian Kitchener reports.

headline.print_headline: Japan Current Account Deficit Widens to Record, Q4 Growth Slows
headline.main: Japan Current Account Deficit Widens to Record, Q4 Growth Slows

docs.snippet: Japan posted a record current account deficit in January and fourth quarter growth was revised down, heightening fears of a deepening economic slowdown amid soft exports and an expected chill in demand from an increase in the sales tax....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan posted a record current account deficit in January and fourth quarter growth was revised down, heightening fears of a deepening economic slowdown amid soft exports and an expected chill in demand from an increase in the sales tax.

headline.print_headline: Japan Has Record Deficit, Lowers Growth Estimate
headline.main: Japan Has Record Deficit, Lowers Growth Estimate

docs.snippet: Japan racked up a record current account deficit in January, and lowered its growth estimate for the October-December quarter Monday in the latest sign of hardships for the world's third-largest economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan racked up a record current account deficit in January, and lowered its growth estimate for the October-December quarter Monday in the latest sign of hardships for the world's third-largest economy.

headline.print_headline: Magnitude 6.0 Quake Hits in Oaxaca, Mexico: USGS
headline.main: Magnitude 6.0 Quake Hits in Oaxaca, Mexico: USGS

docs.snippet: A magnitude 6.0 quake hit in Oaxaca state in southwestern Mexico, the U.S. Geological Survey said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A magnitude 6.0 quake hit in Oaxaca state in southwestern Mexico, the U.S. Geological Survey said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Rondo Has 18 Assists, Celtics Beat Pistons 118-111
headline.main: Rondo Has 18 Assists, Celtics Beat Pistons 118-111

docs.snippet: The Boston Celtics overcame Detroit's dominance inside by passing the ball precisely and protecting it better than they had all season....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics overcame Detroit's dominance inside by passing the ball precisely and protecting it better than they had all season.

headline.print_headline: Thornton Scores 27 to Lead Nets Past Kings, 104-89
headline.main: Thornton Scores 27 to Lead Nets Past Kings, 104-89

docs.snippet: Marcus Thornton scored 15 of his 27 points in the fourth quarter against his old team and Joe Johnson added 18 points, helping the Brooklyn Nets overcome an injury to Paul Pierce in a 104-89 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Sunday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marcus Thornton scored 15 of his 27 points in the fourth quarter against his old team and Joe Johnson added 18 points, helping the Brooklyn Nets overcome an injury to Paul Pierce in a 104-89 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Sunday night.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Rebel, Right-Wing Rival in Tight El Salvador Election
headline.main: Ex-Rebel, Right-Wing Rival in Tight El Salvador Election

docs.snippet: A former Marxist guerrilla leader and his conservative rival were in an unexpectedly tight race on Sunday in El Salvador's presidential election run-off with the race too close to call after results came in from over one-third of polling stations....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former Marxist guerrilla leader and his conservative rival were in an unexpectedly tight race on Sunday in El Salvador's presidential election run-off with the race too close to call after results came in from over one-third of polling stations.

headline.print_headline: Ogier Takes Overall Lead With Mexico Win
headline.main: Ogier Takes Overall Lead With Mexico Win

docs.snippet: World rally champion Sebastien Ogier took the lead in the overall standings on Sunday after winning the Rally of Mexico ahead of Volkswagen team mate Jari-Matti Latvala....
docs.lead_paragraph: World rally champion Sebastien Ogier took the lead in the overall standings on Sunday after winning the Rally of Mexico ahead of Volkswagen team mate Jari-Matti Latvala.
